in.teramatrix.flint.driver

Class FlintDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Application
          • in.teramatrix.flint.driver.FlintDriver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.app.Application.ActivityLifecycleCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2

    public class FlintDriver
extends android.app.Application
implements android.app.Application.ActivityLifecycleCallbacks
    Application's ring_new_task preferences are implemented here like font replacement, app crashed management, google analytics tracker declaration etc. And all the constants used in the application are also declared in the class.
    Author:
    mohsin.khan
    Date:
    11/10/2016

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate()
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class android.app.Application

      • applyFont

        private void applyFont(android.content.Context context,
                       java.lang.String typefaceName,
                       java.lang.String fontName)
        Method will replace all system fonts by the provided font.
        Parameters:
        context - application context
        typefaceName - typeface category (font-family) name
        fontName - name of the font stored in assets folder

      • activateCrashHandler

        private void activateCrashHandler()
        A method to handle all uncaught exceptions that causes crashed. In this version, MainActivity has been started if any crash occurs.

      • logout

        public void logout(android.app.Activity activity)
        A method to logout tha current user. It will simply flush all shared preferences and local database. And then start SplashActivity again. It will also stop location service running in the background.

      • getTracker

        public com.google.android.gms.analytics.Tracker getTracker()
        Get the ring_new_task Google Analytics Tracker for this Application. Note : Don't remove this method just because it is unused. It is used via java reflections in googleservices android module.
        Returns:
        tracker
